1_narrative.title: Narrative & Context
items: A session was initiated to build the V7 infrastructure. Within six minutes, the user created a database schema and five core Python scripts, plus a product meta-document, resulting in 12 files created and 1 modified before the session was marked complete.

3_success_criteria.title: Success Criteria
items: Completion of the session with all infrastructure files built, as indicated by the 'Status: Complete' and the creation of specific files.

7_inputs_outputs.title: Inputs & Outputs
items: Inputs: Session intent to build V7 infrastructure.
Outputs: Created files: v7_registry.sql, v7_registry.py, v7_consolidate.py, v7_search_api.py, v7_daily.py, META_PRD_ENTERPRISE_OS_INFRASTRUCTURE.md. Total: 12 files created, 1 file modified.

11_progress.title: Progress Markers
items: Created v7_registry.py, v7_consolidate.py, v7_search_api.py, v7_daily.py, and META_PRD document at 14:43.

14_entities.title: Entity Maps
items: V7 infrastructure: The core system being built.
v7_registry.sql: Database schema file located at 03_CORE_ENGINE/SCHEMAS/.
v7_registry.py, v7_consolidate.py, v7_search_api.py, v7_daily.py: Python script files located at 03_CORE_ENGINE/SCRIPTS/.

19_meta.title: Meta-Observations
items: The session was highly efficient, completing the core file creation for a major infrastructure version in 6 minutes.
Work was logged with precise timestamps and file paths, indicating a structured development process.

summary: A rapid development session successfully created the foundational SQL schema and Python scripts for the V7 infrastructure, along with a product meta-document, completing the core file setup in six minutes.
